name: Help Is On The Way
description:
Help Is On The Way is a weird sci-fi interactive fiction game made on Twine 2. You play as Maria, a mathemagus queer girl lost in a hostile planet looking for her friends---Yvo, an alien bounty hunter & captain of the crew; Alexandra, an agender alchemedic; and Gabriela, genius droidneer and Maria's girlfriend---as you deal with the struggles of anxiety, depression, and a glitched neuronet system.

This is my first Twine game.

Find me on @alliahverso.
